attributes.action: resolve the current loss of confidence in MPs of all parties following the widespread immoral use of expenses by dissolving parliament and calling an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This expense scandal is undoubtedly causing almost complete lack of any authority in the current parliament. There are so many serious issues to resolve, but how can MPs concentrate their minds on the country's woes when their expense claims overide any other issue. It is imperative that the electorate have confidence in both the ability and the moral authority of their elected parliament. Only a general elaction now can allow this to happen

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
